text: Aka Yisrayel fəp, abeki aŋan, akiriŋ aŋan, aboc aŋan kiti, acikəra kɔ aYisrayel ŋancəmɛ kaŋkəra kəca kətɔt kɔ kəmeriya. Ŋatɛfərɛnɛ kɔ aloŋnɛ aLewy aŋɛ ŋanagbaŋnɛ kaŋkəra kəsɛlɛŋ ka danapa da MARIKI kɔ aka Yisrayel mɔ. Afum dacɔ ŋanayi kəca ka tɔrɔ ta Karisim, kɔ dacɔ ŋanayi kəca ka tɔrɔ ta Ebal, pəmɔ tɔkɔ Musa wəcar ka MARIKI ɛnasom ti, a patolanɛ aka Yisrayel tɔcɔkɔ-cɔkɔ mɔ.
